file_content.text: You have your ship, Commander.
And you, my eternal gratitude, my lord. You are everything the Empire promises its people.
And you, a nice stack of credits, mercenary.
And you, my thanks and respect.
The shuttle will go to our techs, be pulled apart and its secrets made ours.
Once again, order triumphs over chaos, and the Empire provides for those who hold true.
Good luck with the shuttle.
How goes the battle, Commander?
You look distressed, Commander. Rebels got you down?
Excuse me--is it commander? You hiring?
Greetings, Commander. Can Imperial Intelligence be of service today?
Have faith in the Empire, and the Empire provides.
Yesterday, I woke to the news that Balmorran rebels had devised a way to avoid our sensors, had developed prototype stealth ships out of shuttles stolen from us.
But I did not lose heart.
Today, a scout literally stumbled upon where the rebels have stashed those same ships. The Empire provides.
Doesn't matter, some said. Nobody could storm the area, wrestle key codes for the shuttles from their pilots, destroy their anti-aircraft defenses, steal a shuttle....
Tell me the details. You know very well I'm capable of all those things.
I could and will.
I do, my lord.
I do, mercenary. And I know you'll want a pile of credits upon your return.
I do, indeed.
So, it was meant to be--me wandering over here right now?
You think it was fate?
What else would you call it?
The rebel pilots will have the keys you need to get inside a shuttle, but there's no way to override the rebels' automated defenses.
You'll need to destroy the laser batteries before you steal the prototype shuttle, then fly it out under heavy fire and countless opposition. An adventure for certain.
Adventure is fine, but I'm looking forward to the money at the end.
For the credits.
For the Empire!
The Empire will provide.
I'm going to wow you.
I'm on it.
Expect to see me flying back shortly, piloting one fancy shuttle.
I'll just be a moment.
They're right. [Refuse quest]
If not you, then someone else. The Empire will provide.
My lord. Good to see you.
Beautiful day, isn't it?
I'll just be a moment.
